about_the_game:
The penguin dashes through the icy world to return to its family. Sometimes sliding, sometimes flying, it overcomes numerous challenges.

Penguins, birds that cannot fly,
"Penguin Take-Off!!" is unlike your typical side-scrolling action game.
Using slide actions, you must slide down slopes and launch yourself into the air to overcome cliffs.
Master the slide actions to guide the penguin back to its family!
A side-scrolling slide action game driven by slide actions.

If you fall off a cliff, you start over. Players can experience tension and exhilaration beyond what the catchy appearance suggests.
From Japan's indie scene! A hardcore side-scrolling slide action game.

Only supports keyboard controls.

Game Tips:
Hold Shift and press D to look ahead a little. Look before you leap!
Performing a slide generates initial speed to maintain the game's sense of speed. Practice sliding repeatedly to get used to its behavior.
Sliding at the right point and timing guarantees success.

This introduction was translated using ChatGPT.

short_description: A penguin races through the ice for its family. Sometimes sliding, sometimes flying, it overcomes numerous challenges. "Penguin Take-Off!!" is a side-scrolling sliding action game. Despite its catchy graphics, players will experience a tension where not a single mistake is permitted.
